Je recommande !

I've played far more of [i]Dead by Daylight[/i] than I care to think about. I truly did enjoy the early days of my time with this game, but as time has gone on, I began to enjoy it less and less.

Now, following the news that Behaviour Interactive, the developer and publisher of [i]Dead by Daylight, [/i]has worked with Boss Protocol to create NFTs (essentially approving of and supporting this new industry which does nothing more than stroke the egos of those who are dumb enough to pay for NFTs and do terrible amounts of environmental damage), I can no longer support or recommend [i]Dead by Daylight[/i] or Behaviour Interactive on moral grounds.

It's fun come from the challenges and horror as the survivors and as the killer. It's hard at first but after time U get better and it becomes easier. Can be scary but that's one of the main purposes of this game, It's thrilling and contains horror.

While the idea of the game is great, they can't seem to make any updates to the game that actually improve playability. Hitboxes are broken, and every change they make seems to only break more things. The game is heavily killer-favored and the game mechanics encourage camping, slugging, and tunneling, which makes it tough to enjoy as a solo-queue survivor. The devs literally have camping, slugging, and tunneling listed as things they won't even consider bannable offenses on their forums- which are the things that make the game SO UNPLEASANT to play when you get a toxic killer. They only care about their micro-transactions and skins, not the people who just want the game to be solid to play. I've played this game a lot and have really tried to stick with it through the nonsense, but it's just tragic. Only play if you have a full custom lobby of friends, the ranked queue is garbage. The game seriously needs a casual mode and some dramatic re-balancing. Also a system to mute/block toxic players and/or ensure you never have to play with them again.
匹配机制一天不改，这游戏一天不火

Délicieusement déséquilibré : ça change. C'est un vrai challenge selon les parties.
Le jeu est sympa et révèle son côté addictif assez rapidement je trouve MAIS (car il y a un mais) : 
- survivants ou tueurs, les comportements toxiques sont légions. Soit on les ignore, soit on s'arrache les cheveux... pour tout dire je suis arrivée à un stade où je ne me laisse plus le temps de lire la conversation à la fin de la partie.
- une attention toute particulière a l'air donnée aux skins et achats annexes... très bien. Mais pendant ce temps le jeu s'essouffle et on rêve de nouvelles maps (oui rien que ça...).
- les bugs mettent du temps à être réparés, et malheureusement le feedback sur le comportement des joueurs ne sert à RIEN : ne soyez donc pas surpris si vous vous faites camper par le tueur 15 parties d'affilé, même en le "signalant" ça ne changera rien :/
Good game, heart be racing. Love deceased by sunrise! Graphics could be better tho.
好玩但是对屠夫很不友好
С начала было все плохо. Потом так себе. Затем все неплохо. Потом отлично. Доволен игрой. Помянул Джейсона.
